motto.title: JJC & Associates Law Office embraces F-I-T (Focus, Integrity, Transparency) as the main philosophy in delivering the best legal services to every client

contents.title: Focus
contents.desc: JJC & Associates Law Office pays full attention to every client’s needs. This law office is committed to handling every legal service thoroughly and carefully, ensuring maximum service with optimal results. By providing in-depth analysis and tailored legal strategies, we make sure that every client receives the most effective, practical, and sustainable solutions.

contents.title: Integrity
contents.desc: Integrity and honesty are the foundation of JJC & Associates Law Office. This law office is committed to always upholding high moral and ethical standards in every legal service provided. We ensure that every action taken for the client’s interests remains firmly grounded in principles of justice and the belief in God Almighty.

contents.title: Transparency
contents.desc: JJC & Associates Law Office is committed to maintaining clear, open, and up-to-date communication with every client. We always provide information that is easy to understand regarding case analysis, legal risks, case developments, and legal strategies taken to create peace of mind and comfort for every client.

client.title: Our Clients

non_company_skill.title: Scope of Expertise - Individual
non_company_skill.desc: JJC & Associates Law Office also provides expertise in legal fields required by individuals, such as:

contents.title: Personal and Family Law
contents.desc: We provide legal opinions related to marriage law, inheritance disputes, guardianship of minors, petitions for legal incapacity, power of attorney for property sales, requests for name changes, heir determination, child adoption, inheritance rejection, and more.

contents.title: Property Law
contents.desc: Our office offers expertise and creativity in legally securing assets and properties owned by individuals.

contents.title: Land and Agrarian Law
contents.desc: We provide legal services in land protection according to applicable laws and collaborate with various notaries and/or PPAT across Indonesia to facilitate the transfer of land rights.

contents.title: Employment Law
contents.desc: Disputes in the Industrial Relations Court (PHI) may involve not only corporations but also individuals as employees. Ensuring the fulfillment of employee rights can be entrusted to us, as we have experience in bipartite, tripartite, and PHI forums.

contents.title: Unlimited Legal Services
contents.desc: JJC & Associates Law Office provides solutions to legal needs for both corporations and individuals under the service name “UNLIMITED SERVICES.” This service offers the experience of having a personal lawyer and/or legal consultant. It allows easy access to all services from our office and CV JJC LAW INDONESIA with flexible service hours, special fees, and regular visits (if required).

contents.title: Legal Consultation and Opinions
contents.desc: We provide consultation regarding existing legal issues and deliver oral or written legal opinions for corporations and individuals to offer the best solutions.

contents.title: Dispute Resolution
contents.desc: Our firm has extensive experience handling various legal disputes. We provide litigation (in court) and non-litigation (out-of-court) services such as mediation, negotiation, conciliation, arbitration, and more.

contents.title: Legal Audit
contents.desc: A solid business foundation requires regular legal reviews to identify issues that may go unnoticed. Legal audits are conducted across various aspects such as establishment, licensing, intellectual property, contracts, labor, corporate assets, and transactions—serving as guidance for legal improvements, expansion, mergers, acquisitions, or compliance requirements.

contents.title: Company Establishment
contents.desc: Corporate legality and compliance are essential for long-term business sustainability. We provide assistance from the planning stage of company establishment to post-establishment, offering knowledge, protection, guidance, and recommendations in licensing, capital structuring, partnerships, and company structure.

contents.title: Mergers, Acquisitions, Consolidations, and Spin-Offs
contents.desc: We provide assistance and legal protection during corporate legal processes, ensuring document security and optimal legal strategies in mergers, acquisitions, consolidations, and spin-offs.

contents.title: Liquidation / Company Dissolution
contents.desc: Our office offers comprehensive legal services to assist companies in the liquidation process. We handle documentation, settlement of obligations, and risk mitigation while ensuring the rights of all parties are protected.

contents.title: Business Contract Drafting and Legal Document Review
contents.desc: Our team includes Certified Contract Drafters, officially tested by the National Professional Certification Body, ensuring competence in drafting contracts, reviewing legal documents for risk assessment, avoiding contractual weaknesses, and assisting in negotiations of business agreements.
